title: Emails show Bank of America's struggles with Nvidia AI: 'You have to help us as local car mechanics drive the race car!'
full_text:
Emails show Bank of America's struggles with Nvidia AI: 'You have to help us as local car mechanics drive the race car!'. Internal emails show Bank of America having difficulties with Nvidia's AI Factory, showing the challenges of integrating AI in regulated industries.. Nvidia president and CEO Jensen HuangPatrick T. Fallon / AFP via Getty Images
  • Bank of America struggled with adopting Nvidia's AI software, internal emails showed.
